short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily capture screenshots from multiple URLs with MultipleScreenshots extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MultipleScreenshots is a Chrome extension that makes capturing screenshots from multiple URLs easy and efficient. Simply paste a list of URLs into the extension, and it will automatically open each webpage, take a screenshot, and save it according to your customized preferences. Whether you need screenshots for documentation, analysis, or presentations, MultipleScreenshots streamlines the process, saving you valuable time and effort.

Key features include:
- Customizable Delay: Set a delay to ensure all elements load before taking screenshots.
- Flexible File Naming: Customize screenshot file names for better organization.
- Format Options: Choose from various screenshot formats.
- CSV Generation: Automatically create a CSV file mapping URLs to screenshot file names for efficient analysis.

Enjoy easy and efficient screenshot capturing with MultipleScreenshots!

If you encounter any bugs or have ideas for new functionalities, please contact us at kontakt@wentago.pl.

If you find MultipleScreenshots helpful, consider supporting its development with a donation here -> https://buymeacoffee.com/skolmowski
